caption.title: Within-host evolution model.
caption.p:
The effective viral population size is modelled as a two piece linear function: first, it grows at rate β 1 until a random peak time t
x , allowed to vary among individuals between t
a and t
b . After t
x , the viral population size decreases or stabilizes at a rate β 2. The dashed line represents one possible realization. This figure is part of [ 21].
Click here for additional data file.
